<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deadweight Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1961)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=116" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your joints loosen and bones thicken, making your body incredibly weighty and difficult to maneuver around. 

**Benefit** You gain an item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) and [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40), to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove or Trip you, and to saving throws against effects that attempt to force you to [move](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) or knock you [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). 

**Drawback** You gain the [encumbered](/Conditions.aspx?ID=12) condition and can't remove it while under the effects of the mutagen.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Deadweight Mutagen (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +1, and the duration is 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Deadweight Mutagen (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +2, and the duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Deadweight Mutagen (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +3, and the duration is 1 hour. You can attempt to Shove or Trip creatures up to two sizes larger than you.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Deadweight Mutagen (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +4, and the duration is 1 hour. You can attempt to Shove or Trip creatures up to three sizes larger than you.
name: Deadweight Mutagen (Greater)
